description: A barge will mobilize to 13 staging locations across Haida Gwaii and the Northern and Central Coast of BC to assist with heli-slinging operations. Project will mobilize and demobilize at the Prince Rupert area. The work will be tentatively set between May 13 – July 1, 2024.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### F1705-231037 Tug and Barge Services, Northern BC

#### Notice Number and Title
* **Notice Number and Title (English)**: F1705-231037 - Tug and Barge Services in Northern BC
* **Notice Number and Title (French)**: F1705-231037 - Services de remorqueur et de chaland en Colombie-Britannique du Nord

#### Contract Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4458017940-Doc4483503889
* **Modification Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4458017940

#### Tender Information
* **Publication Date**: March 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 26, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 13, 2024
* **Tender Status**: *Expired*

#### Description of Work
A contract is sought for tug and barge services to assist with heli-slinging operations in the Haida Gwaii and Northern and Central Coast regions of British Columbia. The project will involve mobilizing the barge to 13 staging locations, setting up and taking down operations at Prince Rupert, and working between May 13 and July 1, 2024. 

#### Inquires and Contact
For more information, please contact:
Mary Parsons, 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 
11 Laurier St, Phase III, 
Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, 
Phone: None, 
Email: mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Trade Agreement and Regions of Service
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Service**: British Columbia

#### Source and Links
The full tender notice can be found at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19108835?extsite=MTkxMDg4MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note that I reformatted the output to fit the requested length and style, but there might be some minor details altered for better formatting and coherence. If there is an error, please let me know and I will correct it. 

CC: Valorie Jackson, Prime Document Finalizer, Octavia Trade Coordinator  and Ron Lotvis,
